additionalBodyText: We would love to keep you up–to–date about new case studies and other information from iConsult Cardiology by email. Please let us know if you would like us to contact you.
formPracticeAddressPlaceholder: e.g. Vet Surgery, Street, Town, Postcode
marketingRequest1: Yes please, I’d like to hear from iConsult Cardiology
marketingRequest2: No thanks, I don’t want to hear from iConsult Cardiology
footerText: If you haven’t received your certificate within a few minutes, please check your junk folder. If you believe the email has not arrived please contact AHpetvetmarketing.GB@boehringer-ingelheim.com for support.
